data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Dibër, Albania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dibër, Albania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Dibër, Albania the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Dibër, Albania.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Dibër, Albania to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Over 66.36 percent of the people of Dibër are far from Jesus.
Jesus, I pray that all the Turk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turk people is yours.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Dibër, Albania that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Dibër do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Dibër, Albania will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
